: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus gets up to see Flicker out.
Rodimus Prime: Ok, that would be good. Keep me updated. Oh, and Flicker, I'll keep this conversation confidential.
 "cardhead649 <cardhead649@...>" <cardhead649@...> wrote:Flicker::

"Thanks."  Flicker stands up.  "Well, I guess I should go check on 
Condor."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus Prime: Of course. I'm honored to have each and every member 
here as my crew. You included.
>  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:Flicker::
> 
> "Really?"  He does his best to sound hopeful.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus Prime: Listen, Flicker. Everyone here is useful and 
needed. 
> You are a valuble member of this crew.
> >  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:Flicker::
> > 
> > Flicker comes inside and sits down next to Rodimus.  "I feel, 
well, 
> > sort of useless.  I mean, I'm a technician and all, but you've 
> > already got Wheeljack to do that stuff.  And from what I've seen, 
> he 
> > does it better."  He's playing the crowd, so to speak - like a 
true 
> > Predacon, Flicker would never really admit that someone else was 
> > better at something than him.

> > there's 
> > > nobody else around.  "There's ... something else I'd like to 
talk

if
